ai-tha-ap52:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,

ai-tha-ap52:5.4_0: Listen to me, I will speak.
ai-tha-ap52:6.1_0: This is the fruit of dying.
ai-tha-ap52:6.2_0: at the fore of the gods.

ai-tha-ap52:20.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Cunda.

ai-tha-ap52:22.1_0: The fifth sub-chapter on Upāli is finished.
